result.title: Moscow International Workshop ACM ICPC 2017
result.content:
Hello everyone!

From 7 to 16 of November 2017, Moscow International Workshop ACM ICPC 2017 is going to be held at MIPT.

We’d like to remind you that there are only a few days left before the participation cost grows again: if you pay before Oct.16, 2017, the price will be $600.

What’s more, if you have tight curricula, you can choose a short Workshop program which lasts from 9 to 16 of November 2017. Please, pay attention that the prices for a short program are also reduced.

Also you can apply for online participation and solve all the contests remotely.

This time you’ll see some new features:

1)Sometimes the coaches and ACM-ICPC seniors will be present during the upsolving, so you can ask them questions. (Special thanks to the guys who give us feedback about our Workshops!)

2) There will be organized one lecture for the division A, which will be interesting for the strongest participants.

In addition to contests, analyses, and lectures, you’ll enjoy a sightseeing tour in Moscow and events organized by our volunteers! ;)
